title: WP_REST_API_Block_Pattern
description: A block pattern in a REST API context.

name.description: The pattern name, in namespace/pattern-name format.

title.description: The pattern title, in human readable format.

viewport_width.description: The pattern viewport width for inserter preview.

inserter.description: Determines whether the pattern is visible in inserter.

block_types.description: Block types that the pattern is intended to be used with.

post_types.description: An array of post types that the pattern is restricted to be used with.

template_types.description: An array of template types where the pattern fits.
